item.title: Data-Driven Management & Digital Consulting Mastercourse
item.description: 📢 3 Week Mastercourse by Celonis - hosted by AIAI 📅 Online launch: 21 June 2022 2:00pm PDF Brochure 👉 Register here 👈 The Course Learn together with Germany’s and New York’s most valuable startup Celonis what the Management of tomorrow will look like in a world that is more digitized than ever. Celonis helps organizations track their internal processes based on digital footprints in IT systems. With this Celonis has turned into the market leader for Executive Management Technology with customers like Unilever, Coca Cola or BMW.

item.title: Postdoctoral Research Position with the ACRC
item.description: 📢 Research Associate in Formal Modelling for Health and Care 📅 Deadline: 24 Jan 2022 10 Jan 2022 📝 Fixed term contract for 30 months 👉 More info and apply here Come work with Jacques Fleuriot, Jane Hillston and me at the School of Informatics, University of Edinburgh and within the multidisciplinary Advanced Care Research Centre - ACRC (http://edin.care/). To support meaningful inference and decision making in the context of advanced care delivery for the older person, computer-based models are needed that can capture the vast body of knowledge both around general and specific care pathways and incorporate data from real-time sources such as sensors.

item.title: Funded PhD opportunity with the ACRC
item.description: 📢 PhD with Integrated Study in Advanced Care 🎓 Monitoring daily living to predict health outcomes 📅 Deadline: 26 Nov 2021 (rolling) 👉 More info and links An exciting opportunity for a interdisciplinary PhD in a fully-funded, integrated, 4-year programme at the Advanced Care Research Centre (ACRC) Academy (http://edin.care/academy). This particular topic involves a combination of IoT and AI, using data-driven and process based techniques to predict health outcomes by monitoring Activities of Daily Living.
